      Calculates the intersection point of the linear functions defined by the 4 given points.

    • Method Detail

      • getInterceptionPointOfTwoLines

        public static java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double getInterceptionPointOfTwoLines(double ax1,
                                                          double ay1,
                                                          double ax2,
                                                          double ay2,
                                                          double bx1,
                                                          double by1,
                                                          double bx2,
                                                          double by2)
        Calculates the intersection point of the linear functions defined by the 4 given points. See: http://paulbourke.net/geometry/lineline2d/ 'ax1', 'ay1', 'ax2', 'ay2' (in) - Points that define linear function a. 'bx1', 'by1', 'bx2', 'by2' (in) - Points that define linear function b.
        Returns:
        Intersection point or null.
